channel.title: How to make a sM when you get item drop?
channel.description:
Hello,
I am using a deltascape source.
And i want to make when you get dclaws drop, it says a sM.
,Thanks.

item.title: How to make a sM when you get item drop?
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

[quote=“Fight247, post:7, topic:280216”]if i post in client.java i get this error client.java:10133: cannot find symbol symbol : variable droppedItem location: class client if (droppedItem.equals(35)) { ^ 1 error Druk op een toets om door te gaan. . .[/quote]

Declare it in the right location, that variable should already be defined.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a sM when you get item drop?

item.title: How to make a sM when you get item drop?

item.description:
@si_force wrote:

The variable droppedItem is not declared.

item.title: How to make a sM when you get item drop?
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

[quote=“Newty, post:2, topic:280216”]case 87: // drop item

Something like:

if (droppedItem.equals(####)) { sM("You have recieved a pair of dragon claws");

IDK if that will work or not. Should though ;)[/quote]

No. It should be in npchandler, or one of the npc files.

Read full topic
